import React, {useState} from 'react'; import './create.css'; import {Container, Row, Col, Form, DropdownButton, Dropdown} from 'react-bootstrap'; import ResponsiveEmbed from 'react-bootstrap/ResponsiveEmbed'; import Navigation from '../common/navbarInner/navbarInner.js'; import Header from '../common/sectionHeader/sectionHeader.js'; import Button from '../common/button/button.js'; import Footer from '../common/footer/footer.js'; function Create() { const [link , setLink] = useState("") return ( <>

Select a VR environment type

Auditorium Durham University

Adding A Discord Bot

Click the button below and follow the link to set-up a discord bot

Inbox

Enter link into the box below to active the session
) } export default Create
